title: Simon de Montfort’s medieval revolution
itunes:title: Simon de Montfort’s medieval revolution
itunes:subtitle: Sophie Ambler chronicles the dramatic life of Simon de Montfort, the 13th-century rebel who battled Henry III for mastery in England. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Historian Sophie Ambler chronicles the dramatic life of Simon de Montfort, the 13th-century rebel who battled Henry III for mastery in England and established a revolutionary form of government. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
